messages.title: Use your vote this Thursday
messages.content: Dear resident, This Thursday you have the chance to decide the future of our country. If the Tories are re-elected this week, we are in for five more years of the same - the NHS pushed deeper into crisis, millionaires given tax breaks and ordinary people left out.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposition to the NHS being pushed deeper into crisis.

mentions.candidate: This Thursday you have the chance to decide the future of our country.
mentions.tacticalSituation: The Tories won here by just 333 votes last time.

issues.health: Opposition to the NHS being pushed deeper into crisis.

leaflet.personalStatement: Lancaster will be one of the places that settles whether we have five more years of the Conservatives, or a Labour government that will take urgent action to defend our living standards.

contactInformation.address: Scotforth Labour Hall, 47 Scotforth Road, Lancaster, LA1 4SA

quotes.text: The Tories plan is failing because they only stand up for a privileged few.

images.caption: Graph showing Lancaster & Fleetwood general election result, 2010.
